item.name: token

request.description: This API supplies the provider token.
This API supplies the consumer token.

item.name: Get Provider Delegate token (via client-id, secret)

header.description: The delegation ID determines which user + role + resource server the token request is being made on behalf by the delegate.It's the ID of the delegation that you can get using the GET delegates API on the auth server.

request.description: This API supplies the provider delegate token.

item.description: The collection comprises APIs that provide the Identity Access Token, which is essential for executing Policy and Access Request APIs.

request.description: This API allows users to create new policies. Users can define and configure policies based on their specific requirements using this endpoint.
This API supplies the consumer token.

item.name: Get Policy: Success (Get the policy ID to delete the verified policy)

request.description: Users can use this API to retrieve a list of policies that have been previously created. It provides a way to view and access the details of existing policies in the system.

item.name: Delete Policy : Success (Delete the Successfully verified policy)

request.description: With the Delete Policy API, users can remove policies that are no longer required.
This API allows users to create new policies. Users can define and configure policies based on their specific requirements using this endpoint.

item.description: The collection comprises APIs that provide the Identity Access Token, which is essential for executing Policy and Access Request APIs.

item.name: access request
200 Create Access Request for Delete: Success

request.description: This API allows users to create a new policy request. Users can submit their requests for specific policies using this endpoint.

Users can utilize this API to retrieve a list of all the policy requests they have generated or retrieve a list of all the policy requests which are generated for them. It provides an overview of the existing requests.
